full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 115 of 228 791 LC2VMAX4 Alessi - Direct on this exhibit? 1 A. Yes. 2 Q. Please continue. 3 A. In here was a large couch and different chairs and small couches in the living room. 4 5 Q. Thank you. Let's move up now to the garden room which I've just circled. Would you please describe that for us. 6 7 A. Yes. The garden room was a long and kind of narrow room. On the left-hand side was Ms. Maxwell's desk. All this rear wall was all the sliding doors. It was a couch in here and these are sliding doors. 8 9 10 11 Q. Okay. Thank you. 12 Now I'm going to circle the room labeled dining room. 13 A. Yes. 14 Q. Would you please describe that room for us. 15 A. The dining room had access to the -- to the lake room, to Ms. Maxwell's desk, to the left, and an entry to the pantry room. 16 17 18 Q. Let's move now to the left, the areas labeled kitchen and pantry. Would you please describe those for us. 19 20 A. Yes. Coming from the pantry, it was a stove. This is the pantry room, it has countertops, and it was a sink by this window. Coming into the kitchen at the right was a stove and range oven. Here was a refrigerator.
